CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1939, pg. 9 reads: "Guests Have Gay Time At Smoketown's Matrons, Maids Party - Loendi - in its new modernistic garb - was the scene of the Matrons' and Maids' holiday party last Wednesday.  The Hawaiian atmosphere prevailed...Misses Alyce Lindsay, Helen Phillips and Roslyn Lindsay entertained in real Hawaiian style...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alyce or Alice Lindsay, Helen Phillips, and Roslyn Lindsay wearing grass skirts, leis, and flowers in their hair, seated on raffia mat in Loendi Club for the Matrons' and Maids' holiday party
